text: You jing ren a! Nimen zai nimen de zongjiao [shiwu zhong] zhong buyao chaoyue fadu, nimen zhi neng dui an la shuo shihua. Ma'er ya zhizi ma xi ha•er sa zhishi an la de yi wei shizhe, zhishi ta ci gei ma'er ya de yiju hua [an la chuangzao yi jian wu shi, zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.] He tasuo chuangzao de yi zhong linghun [zhu], suoyi, nimen dang xinyang an la ji qi shizhemen, nimen buyao shuo “sanweiyiti”, nimen tingzhi shuo zhe zhong hua dui nimen shi zui hao de. An la zhishi du yi de zhu. Zanmei ta chaojue! Ta jue wu ernu. Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi ta de. An la zuyi zuo jianhu zhe!
